entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 23 March 2023
